name: Forms and procedures
text: §325-35  Forms and procedures.  The department of health may prescribe forms and procedures to achieve the purposes of sections 325-32 to 325-34 and shall maintain a complete roster of all exemptions from vaccination or immunization. [L 1945, c 171, pt of §1; am L 1947, c 165, §1(c); RL 1955, §49-35; am L 1967, c 23, §5; HRS §325-35; am L 1974, c 6, §2(3); am L 1997, c 217, §5]
